about_the_game:
This package includes a collection of developer content used for game creation. It can be used to expand game experience.

Features.

-Levels design files.

-Free game desgin content, like images and art.

-Exclusive sounds and music.
detailed_description:
This package includes a collection of developer content used for game creation. It can be used to expand game experience.

Features.

-Levels design files.

-Free game desgin content, like images and art.

-Exclusive sounds and music.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP (SP3) or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (Merom) 1.66GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics Media Accelerator 950 or equivalent
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (Penryn) 2.53 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics Media Accelerator 4500MHD or equivalent
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
